text: Connor Adam McGough (born August 14, 1995) is a professional Canadian football defensive lineman for the Calgary Stampeders of the Canadian Football League (CFL). He was drafted by the Hamilton Tiger-Cats in the first round, fourth overall, in the 2017 CFL Draft and signed with the team on May 24, 2017. He played U Sports football for the Calgary Dinos. ==References== ==External links== *Calgary Stampeders bio Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Canadian football defensive linemen Category:Calgary Dinos football players Category:Players of Canadian football from Alberta Category:Sportspeople from Medicine Hat Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players
title: Connor McGough
